pos_mean_info_list.mean: 接有电线的；以铁丝围起的；极其兴奋的
以金属丝装；打电报给（wire的过去分词）

[电] 接线，架线；线路；金属线缝术
打电报者；用金属线缠结的工人；以铁丝网捕猎鸟兽者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用于捆绑大物件的粗壮而坚固的绳子，一般用绵、毛、麻、金属或其它材料制成。
普通用词，指用棉、毛、丝或纤维等纹成的很细的线，通常用于缝纫、纺织等。
普通用词，指捆绑小件物品的细绳或细带子。
普通用词，含义广泛，指任何一种线，常作引申用。
指比string粗，比rope细，较牢固，通常用于捆扎较小物品的线或绳。用作引申当约束讲。

word_group.brief_definition: 绷紧的绳索；高超（技能）的；高明（判断）的

活跃的人；捉摸不定的人
到最后一刻；直至最后；最终
金属丝规；线规；金属线的号数；金属线的标号
在最后期限之前；及时；刚好赶上

bilingual.target: 这根电线只有2千分之一英寸厚。

bilingual.source: He tried to straighten the bent wire.
bilingual.target: 他试图使弯曲的电线变直。

bilingual.source: He used diagonal pliers to cut the wire.
bilingual.target: 他用斜口钳剪断了电线。

bilingual.source: Please use the pliers to clamp this wire.
bilingual.target: 请用钳子夹住这根电线。

bilingual.source: He repaired the wire with friction tape.
bilingual.target: 他用绝缘胶布修理了电线。

bilingual.source: He fixed the wire with a pair of pliers.
bilingual.target: 他用一把钳子修好了电线。

bilingual.source: She used a plier to fix the broken wire.
bilingual.target: 她用钳子修理断了的电线。

bilingual.source: He used solder to fix the broken wire.
bilingual.target: 他用焊料修好了断裂的电线。

list.abstract: Wire（英 [ˈwaɪə]，美 [ˈwaɪər]），英语单词，作名词用，为金属丝；金属线；电报。作动词用，为发电报给；用金属网诱捕；在拱门边阻挡。短语搭配有be wired to（自然；本能），例句为“He pulled and bit the wire.（他又拉又咬电线。）” Wire名词类近义词有electric cord、electrical wiring，不及物动词类近义词有telegraph，反义词为unwire。
Wire是一个乐队，风 格：后朋克成立时间：1976年，解散时间：1991年

yingyinNormal.en: Prior to midnight we then run this wire from the tree to the water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 午夜之前我们用这段电线连接闪电树和水。

yingyinNormal.en: How do we know the wire's not gonna burn up? Because I invented it. I assure you, it won't burn up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们怎么保证电线不会被烧坏呢？因为这是我发明的，我保证它不会烧坏。

yingyinNormal.en: Matt Guire, Mark Lynn, Ben Wire... Anymore. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦特威尔，马克林恩，班韦斯。我已经不会了。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Trey was the one wearing the wire. You said you didn't know who was wearing the wire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 带窃听器的就是特雷。你说你不知道谁带窃听器。

yingyinNormal.en: I need you to teach me how to rig a high wire. High wire for what? You're a street juggler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你教我如何吊高空钢索。什么高空钢索？你是街头艺人。

yingyinNormal.en: I think I would just cut the wire. Always a way out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为应该剪断铁丝网。你总有歪点子。

yingyinNormal.en: So I'm thinking, maybe I should get back on my wire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我想或许我该走回去。

yingyinNormal.en: How the hell did you get them up on that telephone wire?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你他娘的怎么把我衣服弄到电话线上去了？

yingyinNormal.en: And if I were to shift my weight, I would become a wire walker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要身体的重心一改变，我就成了走钢索人。

yingyinNormal.en: But any time the big top was empty, I would practice on the wire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但只要大帐棚有空档，我就练习走钢索。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, that needs to go onto a cooling wire. You can't eat it when its hot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，放在冷却丝上，现在很热，不能吃。

yingyinNormal.en: My dream is to hang a high wire between those Twin Towers, and walk on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的梦想就是在世贸双子星中间架起钢索，然后走过它。

yingyinNormal.en: All I could see was the wire, floating out in a straight line to infinity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我眼中只看见钢索，一路伸往无尽的远处。

yingyinNormal.en: And how high must this wire be to make so much glory? Over 100 stories high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钢索要吊多高才算了不起？超过100层楼高。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, over the Straights. My crash. Something tripped my fly-by-wire. Exactly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，在直道上那次事故，控制系统受到了外力干扰。正是。

yingyinNormal.en: And I said, This is where I must put my wire. This is how I will redeem myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我对自己说“我一定要在这里吊钢索”，我要这样为自己扳回一城。

yingyinNormal.en: My dream. And this is you. Yes. It will be the most glorious high wire walk in history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的梦想。这是你。对，这将是史上最了不起的高空走钢索。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I salute the wire, then the towers, and then I salute the great city of New York.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先我向钢索行礼，接着是双子星大楼，然后我向…伟大的纽约市致敬。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? For what? Why do you walk on the wire? Why do you tempt fate? Why do you risk death?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？你为什么要走钢索？为什么要挑战命运？为什么冒险送死？

yingyinNormal.en: And wood! You must remember to put wood blocks between the wire and the building's struts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有木头！千万记住在钢索和大楼支柱间放木块。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 电线; 电话; 电报
打电报给; 用电报传送

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Snap decisions can be important defense mechanisms; if we are judging whether someone is dangerous, our brains and bodies are hard-<highlight>wired</highlight> to react very quickly, within milliseconds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 快速决策可能是重要的防御机制； 如果我们要判断某人是否危险，我们的大脑和身体天生就会在几毫秒内做出非常快速的反应。

examination_example.sentence: If we take a moment and think about how we are likely to react, we can reduce or even eliminate the negative effects of our quick, hard-<highlight>wired</highlight> responses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们花点时间思考一下我们可能会如何反应，我们可以减少甚至消除我们快速、本能反应的负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: Our ability to mute our hard-<highlight>wired</highlight> reactions by pausing is what differentiates us from animals: dogs can think about the future only intermittently or for a few minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有能力通过暂停的方式减弱本能反应能力，这使我们有别于动物：狗仅仅能够间歇地或用几分钟思考未来。

examination_example.sentence: Infants are <highlight>wired</highlight> to look at parents' faces to try to understand their world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 婴儿会本能地看着父母的脸，试图理解他们的世界。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 无线电收音机；无线电广播；无线电报

word_family.mean: n. 金属丝；金属线；电报；线；隐蔽式电子收听器；起跑线；终点线

sense_info_list.en:
metal drawn out into the form of a thin flexible thread or rod; 
connect a building, piece of equipment, or others to an electricity supply using wires
sense_info_list.zh: 电线; 用导线给(建筑物、设备等)接通电源

examination_example.sentence: In emerging economies, rural communities are bypassing the <highlight>wires</highlight> and wooden poles that spread power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在新兴经济中，农村社区正绕过输送电力的电线和木杆。

examination_example.sentence: Because as human beings, we are hard-<highlight>wired</highlight> to optimize.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为作为人类，我们与生俱来就会优化。

examination_example.sentence: If personalities are hard-<highlight>wired</highlight> into our genes, what can governments do to help us?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果个性是与生俱来的，那么政府能做些什么来帮助我们呢？

sense_info_list.zh: 根植于; 由基因决定

examination_example.sentence: In times of emotional turmoil, remember that emotions arise because your senses are <highlight>wired</highlight> to the primitive part of your mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在情绪混乱的时候，记住情绪的产生是因为你的感官根植于大脑中的本能。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: When two places were connected with <highlight>wire</highlight>, people in those places could hear each other talk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当两个地方用电线连接起来时，那些地方的人们可以听到彼此的谈话。

examination_example.sentence: They listened in amazement as the voice of a singer was heard through the <highlight>wires</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当一个歌手的声音通过电线传过来时，他们惊讶地听着。
